name: 2 Hour Project Week 4 - HR Nightmare
description:
Another week of one ridiculous game! I had some fab things this week.

--THIS WEEK--

I was given:

A carousel with sloths instead of horses - @emmaahume

Office Boss Rush - Revenge of Karen from HR - @Hello_Piers

Suits - @YuuuPatsu

Umbrella swords-  @BelleHathNoFury

Batitsu- the art of gentlemanly combat- @MordanonVihl

Giant Watermelons - @_hollyrebecca

Talking Flowers - @roseybit

Story:

You are the gentlemanly owner of a carousel. One day you get a call from Karen in HR telling you that you've been fired. Apparently someone reported that you'd been wearing your favourite red tie, when company policy clearly states you must wear a green one. You work alone, nobody could've reported you, something seems wrong! What's more, the next day when you go to check on your carousel, it's gone! There is an evil at work here, and its roots seem to start in the HR department. You take your trusty umbrella sword and head in to find out just what has become of HR and its staff...

Controls: 

Mouse - Click enemies when they enter your range

R - Resets the level

Game:

When an enemy enters your range you can click it to move. Use this to get around the maps. Kill the flower to progress.

Thanks for checking out my wak shit.
